tit.e: Ine Bay (a bay in Ine Town, Kyoto Prefecture)
Ine Bay (a bay in Ine Town, Kyoto Prefecture)

sen.j: 伊根湾（いねわん）は京都府与謝郡伊根町にある湾。
sen.e: Ine Bay is a bay located in Ine cho, Yosa gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ine Bay is a bay located in Ine Town, Yosa-gun County, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ine Bay is a bay located in Ine Town, Yosa County, Kyoto Prefecture.
It is written in English as "Ine bay."
It is written in English as "Ine bay."
It is written in English as "Ine bay."

sen.j: 日出地区、高梨地区、平田地区、立石地区、耳鼻地区、亀山地区が湾岸を囲んでおり、湾の南側には青島 (京都府)がある。
sen.e: Hide district, Takanashi district, Hirata district, Tateishi district, Nibi district, and Kameyama district circle the bay shore, and to the south of the bay, there is Aoshima (Kyoto Prefecture).

Hide district, Takanashi district, Hirata district, Tateishi district, Nibi district, and Kameyama district circle the bay shore, and to the south of the bay, there is Aoshima Island (Kyoto Prefecture).

Hide district, Takanashi district, Hirata district, Tateishi district, Nibi district, and Kameyama district circle the bay shore, and to the south of the bay, there is Aoshima Island (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: 伊根湾はこの青島があることで、風の影響を受けにくく、湾外に比べて波も比較的穏やかである。
sen.e: Owing to this Aoshima, Ine Bay is not easily affected by the wind, and compared to areas outside of the bay, waves are relatively calm.
Owing to this Aoshima Island, Ine Bay is not easily affected by the wind, and waves are relatively fewer than those outside of the bay.
Owing to this Aoshima Island, Ine Bay is not easily affected by the wind, and waves are relatively fewer than those outside of the bay.

sen.j: 湾内には、釣り堀があり、夏を中心に釣り客が多く集まる。
sen.e: There is a fishing pond inside the bay, and many visitors gather mainly in the summertime.
There is a fishing pond inside the bay, and many visitors gather mainly in the summertime.
There is a fishing pond inside the bay, and many visitors gather mainly in the summertime.

sen.j: また、丹後海陸交通が運営する遊覧船が湾内を巡回しており、伊根町の観光名所の一つである伊根の舟屋の見物を目的に観光客が多く訪れる。
sen.e: Also, there are pleasure boats operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd. that go around inside the bay, and there are many tourists who visit to see the Ine no Funaya Houses which is one of the tourist (sightseeing) spots in Ine-cho town.

Also, there are pleasure boats operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd. that go around inside the bay, and there are many tourists who visit to see the Ine no Funaya Houses (houses built on the water's edge in Ine) which is one of the tourist (sightseeing) spots in Ine Town.

Also, there are pleasure boats operated by Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd. that go around inside the bay, and there are many tourists who visit to see the Ine no Funaya Houses (houses built on the water's edge in Ine) which is one of the tourist (sightseeing) spots in Ine Town.
